lead_paragraph: THE TALL BLOND MAN WITH ONE BLACK SHOE is a frothy French farce about espionage, surveillance and mistaken identity. When Francois (Pierre Richard), an unsuspecting violinist, is misidentified as a superspy by national intelligence, outrageous antic
